name: duolingo_scrape_course
description: Scrape Duolingo course information for a specific language.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: ISO 639-1 language code of the target language (e.g. "es" for Spanish, "fr" for French, "de" for German, "ja" for Japanese)

steps.code: const title = document.querySelector('h1')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const desc = document.querySelector('[class*="description"], p')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const skills = []; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="skill"], [class*="unit"], li').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 30) skills.push(el.textContent?.trim()?.slice(0, 100)); }); return { title, description: desc, skills, url: window.location.href };
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract data
